bibl.title: Digital Research in the Study of Classical Antiquity
bibl.note: Introduction. - What is a VRE? - User requirements. - Case study. - Technical perspective. - The wider (ancient) world. - Future challenges.
bibl.seg: BOWMAN Alan K., Charles V. CROWTHER, Ruth KIRKHAM and John PYBUS, A Virtual Research Environment for the Study of Documents and Manuscripts.
